sentences.sContent: Walls, floors, windows, doors and ceiling of packaging and other non-production areas are constructed with hard, nonporous, non-shedding materials.
sentences.sContent_eng: Walls, floors, windows, doors and ceiling of packaging and other non-production areas are constructed with hard, nonporous, non-shedding materials.
sentences.sCn: 包装和其他非生产区的墙壁、地板、门和天花板均采用硬质、无孔、不脱落材料建造。

remMethod.val: non(不) + porous(多孔的； 能渗透的) → 无孔的； 不渗透的

trans.tranOther: not permeable to water, air, or other fluids
